song_lyrics: He Parabrahma, dayāḷu Sahajānand,
Karīe stavan, tav pad-vandan,
He Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj,
Svīkāro lākho, vandan āj...
Je lok bhog tyajīne vichare, tene shu arpaṇ karīe ja ame,
Koī vastu khape nahi jīvanmā, almast sadā Harinā rangmā
... he Parabrahma
Ame bhav-sāgarmā ḍūbatā’tā, tame bāhya grahīne ugārī līdhā,
Daī sharaṇu Shrī Harinu jakḍī, nirbhay kīdhā bhav-bandhanthī
... he Parabrahma
Ā anant deh nyochhāvarīe, tav ruṇ sadā mastak dharīe,
Tav āgnāne ame anusarīe, dradh dhīraj shraddhāthī manḍīe
... he Parabrahma
Karīe nirdhār ame makkam, dejo baḷ-buddhi tav hardam
Amvrutti tuj ākār dhare, Aksharrūp thaī Harine ja vare
... he Parabrahma
Āshish devā āvo āj, Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj,
Krupā ati varsāvo āj, Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj,
Brahmānand lūnṭāvo āj, Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj,
Āvo āvo padhāro āj, Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj,
Swāgatam, swāgatam, swāgatam, shubh swāgatam.
title: He Parabrahma dayāḷu Sahajānand

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
